Detailed Description

This class provides methods to get a DataSet in a DataGroup.

Member Function Documentation

affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet * DataGroup::DataSet ( u_int32_t  dataSetIdx  ) 

Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet index. Each call will return a new DataSet object. The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.

Parameters:
dataSetIdx The index of the DataSet to return.
Returns:
DataSet
Exceptions:
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException DataGroup not found.
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException DataSet not found.

bool affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroup::useMemoryMapping [protected]

A flag the indicates the data access mode. True = access the data using memory-mapping. False = access the data using std::ifstream
